content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I am sure you will find my apartment to be a great place to live. How much are you willing to pay for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student and I am looking for a place that is both affordable and comfortable. I would like to pay around 650 Euro per month, all inclusive. Is this within your price range?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, 650 Euro per month is a very reasonable price for a student. However, considering the prime location of the apartment and the high demand for such properties in the city center, I am looking for a slightly higher rent. How does 700 Euro per month sound to you? This includes all utilities and amenities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 700 Euro per month is a bit higher than my budget. Could we perhaps negotiate a lower price? I am a responsible tenant and I'm sure we can find a mutually agreeable rate.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Of course, Maryam. I am willing to negotiate. How about 680 Euro per month? This is still a very good deal for the location and the amenities provided. Would you be willing to pay this amount?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 680 Euro per month is more acceptable. However, I would really appreciate it if you could consider a price closer to 650 Euro. I am a dependable tenant and I am confident that I will take good care of the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your budget concerns, Maryam. How about this: If you are willing to sign a two-year lease, I can offer you the apartment for 650 Euro per month. This is a special rate for long-term tenants. Would you be interested in this offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: A two-year lease at 650 Euro per month is an attractive offer. I would be very interested in this arrangement. I am a smart, dependable, and responsible tenant who always follows moral and ethical standards. I am sure we will have a good relationship.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Excellent, Maryam. I am glad to hear that we have reached an agreement. Please let me know when you are ready to sign the lease, and we will proceed with the paperwork. Thank you for choosing my apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
